fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • A feature about the war on drugs referred to 35 million Mexicans in the US. That meant to refer to Mexican Americans in the US, and the US Census Bureau estimates that figure to be about 36 million (El Chapo: the last kingpin?, 7 June, page 9, Journal). • Other recently corrected articles include: ‘A zombie party’: the deepening crisis of conservatism How Grenfell survivors came together - and how Britain failed them Neil Woodford blocks investors from pulling cash from flagship fund Travel spending: Put your kids’ cash on a card before they go
